action.description: The committee on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Kila, Grandinetti, Kitagawa, Miyake, Muraoka; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, Evslin, La Chica, Pierick.
